Sarah Cox

Ceramics Artist

Exhibitions

Exhibition schedule this year to date:

  • Dellamore Arts, Summer Exhibition May 1st - 31st May 2013
    Dellamore House, Cornwood, Devon, PL21 9QT 01752 www.delamore-art.co.uk
  • Art in Clay at Hatfield House, 5th/6th/7th July 2013 Hatfield, Hertfordshire, AL9 5NQ www.artinclay.co.uk
  • The Sculpture Show 14th - 19th September 2013 Marle Place Gardens, Brenchley near Tonbridge, Kent, TN12 7HS contact sarah@thesculptureshow.com 01299 896188

Please check back to the website for exhibition updates, or join my mailing list by selecting it on the contact section of the website.
